entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.npc_1_1: I've been a museum curator for many years, and on this planet we found the oldest tomb I've ever seen.  Unfortunately some grave robbers took the artifact I was studying.  If you would be so kind, perhaps you can get it back?
entries.npc_2_1: I thought so.  You look like a good man.  I'll make it worth your while.
entries.npc_3_1: Well, certainly there are other artifacts.  Too bad, this one was really good...
entries.player_1_1: Yeah, I can get it.  I hate grave robbers.
entries.player_2_1: I don't care about artifacts.  Forget it.
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go, these bugs are very rare, and could be worth a lot if you can find a buyer.
entries.npc_1_2: I've been researching animals, but an industrial spy stole one of my cages.  It still had some cell structures in it from the creature.  I need it back before he figures out what's in it.  Can you help me?
entries.npc_2_2: Thanks.  I really appreciate it.  I'll find something to give you when you return.
entries.npc_3_2: Great.  I'm wasting my time with you then.  Do you know anyone who DOES work?
entries.player_1_2: I'll get it back.  Industrial espionage is a terrible thing.
entries.player_2_2: Oh, my, I couldn't care less about you and your problem.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  I found this nice picture of the creature I was studying.  It's really all I have to give you though.
entries.npc_4_1: It was an ancient ritual device of some sort.  I need to study it further to find out exactly what it was for.
entries.npc_4_2: That's highly classified.  That's why I need that evidence back before someone finds out what I was doing.  You don't have a problem with this do you?
entries.player_3_2: What kind of creatures were you studying?
